title: AssignLinkMetadata is missing in xplat Microsoft.Tasks.Core

nodes.body: We haven't for whatever reason converted this to .NET Core yet. Looking quickly at the code I think it should be pretty straightforward. Is this blocking anything for you (to help with priority)?

@AndyGerlicher We don't have anything depending on it, but it did force me to remove the reference in the Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets file. If you remove the reference yourself until it's implemented I don't think it require any fixups on our side.
